content: note this pattern is knit in the round using magic loop or dpns could be substituted this soft little football will delight a special little one worked in #4-worsted wt aran/10-ply yarn it uses little yarn and works up quick knit one up and let the fun begin this would make a great gift together with knit baby football shoes found here http //www craftsy com/pattern/knitting/clothing/knit-baby-football-shoes/127327
